#summary This page specifies how to install the Application.

= How to deploy the application =
The application runs in *Glasfish Application Server* v2.1.1

= Glassfish Resorces =
 #1 Install the DB:expensemanager, run the SQL Script:expensemanager.sql
 #2 JDBC Resorce is based on a connection pool. Create a *Connection Pool* which connects to the DB
 #3 JDBC Resorce: jdbc/expensemanager
